The TUI International Graduate Leadership Program is an 18-month journey through different working environments of the TUI Group companies. The objective: to obtain an in-depth look at the tourism business. It is div_ided in 5 assignments, each of them lasting three to four months, taking place in different countries.
1st Assignment (09/16-12/16) : Hotel Concepts, Product & Trading - Hanover, Germany
2nd Assignment (01/17-06/17) : Product & Purchasing - Luton, UK
Rep Assignment (06/17) : Pula, Croatia
3rd Assignment (06/17-09/17) : Sustainability & Guest Experience - Palma de Mallorca, Spain
4th Assignment (09/17-11/17) : Team Leader Assignment - Malta
5th Assignment (11/17-31/03) : Product - Paris, France
